snippet.title: Oniken + Odallus Collection Physical Switch/PS4 Release! | PLAY Exclusives
snippet.description:
SALE WILL GO LIVE JANUARY 24: playasia.com/exclusives

Two games in one! We couldn't decide between both of these amazing retro-inspired titles from Joymasher - so why not include them both on one cart? 

The Oniken + Odallus Collection on Switch will be limited to 5,000 units total - 3,000 full limited editions, and 2,000 standard copies. 

PS4 will have 1,000 copies of each title available, with a special display box when purchased together. 


Oniken: Unstoppable Edition takes place in a post-apocalyptic future controlled by a sinister corporation, where the ninja mercenary Zaku is the last hope for humanity! Inspired by the demanding gameplay of 8-bit action/platformers, Oniken pits your agility and swordplay against a gauntlet of enemies, traps, and challenging bosses.

Odallus: The Dark Call is an exploration and action game, as well as a loving homage to 8-bit genre classics. You will play as Haggis – a battle-weary warrior who must wield his sword once more to rescue his son from Darkness. Borrowing from many elements of the popular Metroid-vania genre, Odallus tasks players to explore the exciting atmosphere created by well-crafted levels, bosses, and enemy types.
